ReturnPolicy.Description:
No exchange will be offered. 

Refund for faulty items ONLY. Please contact us before returning the items. 

Items are refundable within 7 days of purchase and must be unworn or must have the original tag attached (if available). 

We are sorry to tell you that we will not be responsible for the shipping fee or any costs regarding to the refund process.

ConditionDescription: This hair cube has been gently worn once, in excellent condition.  The cube has light hairline surface scratches and tiny missing paint at the letter "t".  Overall it is clean and in excellent condition.  It's been stored inside a jewellery box and comes from a smoke free and pet free environment.  It DOES NOT come with any dust bag nor box but I can guarantee it is 100% authentic.
